hits.name: Magic Hour
hits.long_description:
Magic Hour is building tools to enable a new generation of AI-first creators.

Video is the most viral content format, but creating high-quality videos is complex and resource-intensive.

We started Magic Hour with the goal of bringing advancements in AI video technology to all consumers.

Since then, we've launched a web application that allows users to generate videos in multiple styles, including animations, video-to-video, face swap, and text-to-video. You can use the product at https://magichour.ai. 

Our videos have reached hundreds of millions of views, and in our next iteration, we're combining creation and consumption by building the TikTok for AI video.
hits.one_liner: Platform for AI video generation.

long_description.value:

one_liner.value: Platform for AI video generation.

hits.name: Retell AI
hits.long_description:
We are developing the most human-like speech generation to enable immersive AI interactions.

Human interactions are subtle and complex, often transcending basic emotional labels such as 'angry' or 'sad'. Achieving truly immersive, human-like speech requires conveying nuanced expressions that align with the situational context and the perceived emotional experience of the AI agent. 

Truly immersive AI interactions will unlock new possibilities, ranging from more engaging AI content to empathetic virtual companions, transforming our interaction with AI.

Retell AI is here to build that reality.
hits.one_liner: Helping Al speak like humans

long_description.value:
We are developing the most human-like speech generation to enable immersive AI interactions.

hits.name: Rove
hits.long_description: Rove is redefining the credit card industry with a no-annual-fee travel card. Utilizing a cash-flow algorithm for underwriting and the first-ever integrated travel portal for points travel, average spenders can effortlessly earn a free trip each year, positioning us as the go-to choice for young adults looking to travel the world.
hits.one_liner: The first travel credit card for Generation Z.

hits.name: camelQA
hits.long_description:
camelQA is developing AI agents capable of testing mobile apps using only an App Store/TestFlight link. These agents autonomously conduct tests and create comprehensive bug reports. We're focused on enhancing app quality and streamlining your QA workflow.

Whether you're looking to boost your QA efficiency or hire camelQA to be your new QA manager and fleet of QA engineers, camelQA can improve your mobile app testing process.
hits.one_liner: AI-driven QA testing. Never write a test case again.

hits.name: Stackwise
hits.long_description:
Stackwise is a directory of extendable and testable code integrations. No more hunting for documentation to integrate with APIs or back and forth with ChatGPT. Just pure, testable functionality!

We have backgrounds working on agentic behaviour and generative AI. We met through AutoGPT where we were both lead maintainers and then founding ai engineers. Here, we built the go-to benchmark in the agent space, and published a NeurIPS paper together.

We are fully open source! Star us at https://github.com/stackwiseai/stackwise
hits.one_liner: Stackwise

long_description.value:

hits.name: Stacksync
hits.long_description:
Stacksync powers real-time and bidirectional data synchronization between CRMs (e.g. Salesforce, Hubspot or SAP) and databases (e.g. Postgres, Google BigQuery,...). Edits made in your CRM will instantly update in your Database, and vice-versa. To set up a sync, users simply have to connect the two chosen apps in one click and select the tables they want to sync, no-code!
Stacksync reduces implementation delays from months to minutes for CRM integration projects and removes all the complexity behind CRM new feature development. We show a 90% improvement on delivery time and budget.
hits.one_liner: Real-time and two-way sync between CRMs and Databases

long_description.value:
Stacksync powers real-time and bidirectional data synchronization between CRMs (e.g. Salesforce, Hubspot or SAP) and databases (e.g. Postgres, Google BigQuery,...). Edits made in your CRM will instantly update in your Database, and vice-versa. To set up a sync, users simply have to connect the two chosen apps in one click and select the tables they want to sync, no-code!
Stacksync reduces implementation delays from months to minutes for CRM integration projects and removes all the complexity behind CRM new feature development. We show a 90% improvement on delivery time and budget.

one_liner.value: Real-time and two-way sync between CRMs and Databases

hits.name: Carma
hits.long_description:
We are a marketplace enabling car owners to get same-day repair services with instant transparent offers and guaranteed pricing. Every year, car owners spend $573B on auto repairs globally.

Car owners send service requests through Carma to our highly-rated and vetted service center Partners, who respond with real-time offers. Car owners can compare multiple same-day service offers in 60 seconds or less. Carma handles the transaction.

Car owners save upwards of 50% when they use Carma vs. the median price for the same service in their zip code. It takes 30 seconds to add a car to your profile and request service.

We are currently accepting Carma for Business customers:

If you own multiple commercial vehicles for your business and are interested in trusted same-day turnaround for your fleet, contact us at 314-899-2886 or at fleets@joincarma.com.

If you are an owner of a highly-rated automotive service center and are interested in increasing revenue with more profitable high-ticket work, contact us at 314-899-2886 or at shops@joincarma.com.
hits.one_liner: Marketplace for Same-Day Auto Repair.

hits.name: Superagent.sh
hits.all_locations: Gothenburg, V√§stra G√∂taland County, Sweden; Remote
hits.long_description:
Superagent allows developers to build AI-assistants and to embed them into their own applications. These AI-assistants are purpose built for a task at hand, e.g. sales or legal work, and can be equipped with custom knowledge, memory, and API connectivity.

It can be helpful to think of Superagent as an open source and multi model version of OpenAI Assistants API, but with full control over the customer experience. We also provide full auditability, privacy, and data security. Crucial for running AI-assistants in production.

We also provide a hosted service that allows developers to effortlessly deploy AI-assistants  without worrying about infrastructure, dependencies, or configuration.
hits.one_liner: The open framework for building AI-assistants

all_locations.value: Gothenburg, V√§stra G√∂taland County, Sweden; Remote

hits.name: CodeAnt AI
hits.long_description:
Code Ant AI is a devtool that helps companies enforce clean code, effortlessly. It converts your existing code into highly scalable, optimised, and readable code, allowing your developers to dedicate more time to crafting new logic and less time to fixing or cleaning things up. It directly integrates with developer's IDE and CI tools.

Features of CodeAnt AI:
1) Detects and fixes 600+ Code Optimizations (CPU, Memory, Latency).
2) Detects and adds Scalability (Failure Retry, Delays, Rate-limiting, etc.) logic inside the code.
3) Removes Code Smells and adds Docstring, Unit tests, TypeHints with every code change.
hits.one_liner: Scale, Optimise & Enforce Clean Code, Effortlessly!

long_description.value:
Code Ant AI is a devtool that helps companies enforce clean code, effortlessly. It converts your existing code into highly scalable, optimised, and readable code, allowing your developers to dedicate more time to crafting new logic and less time to fixing or cleaning things up. It directly integrates with developer's IDE and CI tools.

Features of CodeAnt AI:
1) Detects and fixes 600+ Code Optimizations (CPU, Memory, Latency).
2) Detects and adds Scalability (Failure Retry, Delays, Rate-limiting, etc.) logic inside the code.
3) Removes Code Smells and adds Docstring, Unit tests, TypeHints with every code change.

one_liner.value: Scale, Optimise & Enforce Clean Code, Effortlessly!

hits.name: OpenCopilot
hits.long_description:
‚≠ê We are building a way to let your SaaS product's users chat with your product functionality and execute things just by text (natural language).

‚≠ê It will give your product's users a new text-based interface that is much easier to interact with, the copilot will have access to your product's APIs, so it can call them and retrieve/add data to and from them.

‚≠ê ‚û°Ô∏è For example, If Jira used OpenCopilot, Jira users could ask things like "Please create a new board, and then add new tickets about our payments migration project then assign X on it". So no more clicks on the UI, they can describe whatever they want to do via text. 

‚≠ê ‚û°Ô∏è Most of your flows will be automatically handled (you do not need to configure it), or you can define them manually via our flows editor.

We are 100% open source with more than 2500 stars on GitHub!
hits.one_liner: Build an AI copilot for your own product.

long_description.value:
‚≠ê We are building a way to let your SaaS product's users chat with your product functionality and execute things just by text (natural language).

‚≠ê It will give your product's users a new text-based interface that is much easier to interact with, the copilot will have access to your product's APIs, so it can call them and retrieve/add data to and from them.

‚≠ê ‚û°Ô∏è Most of your flows will be automatically handled (you do not need to configure it), or you can define them manually via our flows editor.

hits.name: Markprompt
hits.long_description:
Close customer support tickets faster with AI.

We‚Äôre building AI infrastructure to power customer support at scale. With Markprompt, companies can automate customer support, scale without increasing headcount, and deliver exceptional user experiences.
 
Scaling customer support with headcount is expensive, with human resources accounting for 90%+ of customer support expenses. On top of that, customer support agents often burn out leading to turnover and reduced quality. As companies grow, so does their expert knowledge, which is hard to access at scale and makes keeping employees up-to-date nearly impossible.

Markprompt addresses the root of the information access problem by indexing all available knowledge within a company, setting the foundation for a robust system of record to feed the AI. Built from the ground up with an API-first approach, Markprompt provides SDKs (such as React hooks and components) and no-code tools to enable integrations at all touchpoints in the customer journey.
hits.one_liner: AI for customer support

long_description.value:
Close customer support tickets faster with AI.

We‚Äôre building AI infrastructure to power customer support at scale. With Markprompt, companies can automate customer support, scale without increasing headcount, and deliver exceptional user experiences.

Built from the ground up with an API-first approach, Markprompt provides SDKs (such as React hooks and components) and no-code tools to enable integrations at all touchpoints in the customer journey.

one_liner.value: AI for customer support

hits.name: Celest
hits.long_description:
Celest is a managed cloud platform for Flutter and Dart developers. We are introducing "Cloud Widgets", a set of primitives which enable you to declaratively define every piece of your backend and infrastructure in Dart.

As the role of the front-end developer evolves towards full-stack proficiency, we recognize that existing tools have fallen short for those specializing in Flutter. To address this, our platform offers a familiar experience. Using the programming language and patterns Flutter developers already when building their frontend, Celest enables developers to build and connect their apps to their backend without needing additional tooling.

We enable Flutter developers can concentrate on building features and delivering value to their customers, rather than learning additional domains and fragmenting themselves across disparate tool chains.
hits.one_liner: The Flutter cloud platform

long_description.value:
Celest is a managed cloud platform for Flutter and Dart developers. We are introducing "Cloud Widgets", a set of primitives which enable you to declaratively define every piece of your backend and infrastructure in Dart.

As the role of the front-end developer evolves towards full-stack proficiency, we recognize that existing tools have fallen short for those specializing in Flutter. To address this, our platform offers a familiar experience. Using the programming language and patterns Flutter developers already when building their frontend, Celest enables developers to build and connect their apps to their backend without needing additional tooling.

We enable Flutter developers can concentrate on building features and delivering value to their customers, rather than learning additional domains and fragmenting themselves across disparate tool chains.

one_liner.value: The Flutter cloud platform

hits.name: Artisan AI
hits.long_description:
Artisans are advanced human-like digital workers trained to do specific roles, who integrate alongside human teams. They have unique faces, names, memories & skills, and they continuously improve once they are employed, molding to each company's needs.

Our first Artisan, Ava, automates the entire outbound sales process and can be set up with a 10-minute conversation. Ava creates TCPs, prospects with her database of over 270,000,000 contacts, crafts & sends highly bespoke email sequences, and books meetings into your calendar. And, you can manage all features & settings by talking to Ava via Slack. 

Next year, we'll release a workforce of Artisans, including the Graphic Designer and Marketing Manager. Each Artisan works both with our native feature-rich software and popular external platforms.

We're not creating another SaaS product for teams to use, we're creating new team members. 

This is the next Industrial Revolution.
hits.one_liner: Creating the first human-like digital workers, called Artisans

hits.name: Momentic
hits.long_description:
Momentic enables developers to deploy AI agents to test web apps end-to-end. Developers can describe user flows in natural language, and our AI adapts to any UI updates, ensuring tests are always up-to-date and eliminating flakiness.

With our desktop app and cloud platform, we're able to accelerate development cycles as well as support testing at scale from local builds to production environments.
hits.one_liner: Deploy AI agents to test web applications using natural language.

long_description.value:
Momentic enables developers to deploy AI agents to test web apps end-to-end. Developers can describe user flows in natural language, and our AI adapts to any UI updates, ensuring tests are always up-to-date and eliminating flakiness.

With our desktop app and cloud platform, we're able to accelerate development cycles as well as support testing at scale from local builds to production environments.

one_liner.value: Deploy AI agents to test web applications using natural language.

hits.name: Vectorview
hits.long_description: Get insights into user behaviour and model performance by automatically grouping questions and evaluating LLM answers. Optimize your RAG pipeline by understanding how your embedded documents are used. Improve your LLM app, monitor performance and prevent hallucinations.

hits.name: ion design
hits.long_description:
Ion automatically converts Figma designs into clean react code to speed up front-end engineers.

We use AI to understand your codebase and generate code within the context of your design systems and styling libraries. We also incorporate your existing components to your generations to ensure high code quality.
hits.one_liner: We automatically convert Figma designs into clean React code

hits.name: Duckie AI
hits.long_description:
Duckie is a platform that lets engineers manage a team of AI software development companions (Ducklings) that get their dev work done.

Ducklings work with engineers to complete end-to-end feature development, from design to implementation. Ducklings chat with users to define their goals, come up with engineering designs, and generate code.
hits.one_liner: AI software development companion that gets your work done.

long_description.value:
Duckie is a platform that lets engineers manage a team of AI software development companions (Ducklings) that get their dev work done.

Ducklings work with engineers to complete end-to-end feature development, from design to implementation. Ducklings chat with users to define their goals, come up with engineering designs, and generate code.

one_liner.value: AI software development companion that gets your work done.

hits.name: Ubicloud
hits.long_description:
Ubicloud is an open and portable cloud. Think of it as an open alternative to cloud providers, like what Linux is to proprietary operating systems.

Our cloud services include elastic compute, block storage, and virtual networking. They can run on any bare metal provider and reduce cloud infrastructure costs by 3-10x.
hits.one_liner: Open and portable cloud

long_description.value:
Ubicloud is an open and portable cloud. Think of it as an open alternative to cloud providers, like what Linux is to proprietary operating systems.

Our cloud services include elastic compute, block storage, and virtual networking. They can run on any bare metal provider and reduce cloud infrastructure costs by 3-10x.

one_liner.value: Open and portable cloud

hits.name: Onboard AI
hits.long_description:
Onboard lets you chat with any codebase of up to 10 repos to locate and understand functionality, diagnose bugs, generate complex code changes and more. 

It is ChatGPT with real-time updated knowledge of your codebase, as well as any public/open-source library. 

You can start using Onboard with just two clicks - just sign-in with GitHub and paste-in the name of any GitHub repo. 

Onboard can also be hosted 100% on your cloud, including the AI models, so not a single line of your code ever leaves your cloud.
hits.one_liner: Private, secure AI subject-matter expert on any codebase

long_description.value:
Onboard lets you chat with any codebase of up to 10 repos to locate and understand functionality, diagnose bugs, generate complex code changes and more.

hits.name: Leya
hits.long_description:
Leya is an AI assistant designed for legal professionals, adept at answering complex legal questions and optimizing workflows. By integrating laws, cases, and regulations, Leya delivers reliable, source-cited answers and allows lawyers to start using gen AI today.

Already in use at top-tier law firms aiming to stay ahead of the game, Leya is open for early access.
hits.one_liner: An honest AI assistant for lawyers

hits.name: AgentHub
hits.all_locations: Vancouver, BC, Canada; San Francisco, CA, USA
hits.long_description:
AgentHub is a platform for automating repetitive and complex workflows end-to-end with AI. 

Builders drag, drop, and connect modular components onto a canvas to build powerful automations.

We provide the tools and the infrastructure to operate at 10x the speed of writing, testing, and productionizing code so you can focus on the problem at hand.

hits.name: GovernGPT
hits.long_description:
GovernGPT reviews Marketing Materials in Real-Time using AI, like"Grammarly" but for Compliance. 

Content reviews in investment management are time-intensive, full of heavy back and forth, repeat mistakes, and inconsistency leading to slowdowns for marketing & delayed publication to investors. This process is frustrating for both author & reviewer while being a key focus of regulators such as SEC.
hits.one_liner: Compliance 'Grammarly'

long_description.value:

This process is frustrating for both author & reviewer while being a key focus of regulators such as SEC.
